J95-pn1-ht1-E1n6-M1¶

Directory.¶

Data is stored in the following directory:

  • mheimpel/Jup95/nsb/poly_n1/E1n6/runM1

Available data.¶

The following data for analysis are aviable:

  • Parameter file (original): main_input.org

  • Checkpoint data directory: Checkpoints

  • Global averaged data directory: G_Avgs

  • Sphere averaged data directory: Shell_Avgs

  • Shell spectrum data directory: Shell_Spectra

  • Longitudinal averaged data directory: AZ_Avgs

  • Fields on spheres directory: Shell_Slices

Parameters.¶

The following parameters are used:

Name

Parameter

\(N_{r}\)

n_r

1024

\(N_{\theta}\)

n_theta

1536

\(Np_{column}\)

npcol

1024

\(Np_{row}\)

nprow

512

\(r_o / r_i\)

aspect_ratio

9.50E-01

\(r_o - r_i\)

shell_depth

1.00E+00

Chebyshev grid

chebyshev

.true.

rotation

rotation

.true.

magnetism

magnetism

.FALSE.

viscous heating

viscous_heating

.TRUE.

\(E = \frac{\nu}{\Omega L^2}\)

Ekman_Number

1.000000000000E-06

Prandtl_Number

1.000000000000E+00

.FALSE.

fix_dtdr_bottom

dTdr_bottom

-1.000000000000E+00

Examples of visualized images.¶

Time evolution of kinetic energy density \(E_{kin} = \frac{1}{2} v^{2}\) in the spherical shell as function of time normalized by the viscous diffusion time \(\tau_{\nu} = L^{2} / \nu\). from the first data output time.

azimuthal component of the velocity field \(u_{\phi}\) at \(r = r_o\) and \(t = 3.096 \times 10^{2}\)

Radial component of the velocity field \(u_r\) at \(r = r_o - 0.145\) and \(t = 3.096 \times 10^{2}\)

Entropy \(S\) at \(r = r_o - 0.145\) and \(t = 3.096 \times 10^{2}\)

Longitudinal average ofEntropy perturbation \(S - (4\pi r^{2})^{-1} \int S dS\) (left) and zonal velocity field \(u_\phi\) (right) in the fluid shell at \(t = 3.096 \times 10^{2} \tau_{\nu}\).

Kinetic energy density spectra as a function of spherical harmonic degree \(l\) at \(r = r_o\) and \(t = 3.096 \times 10^{2}\)
